member.name: M:Hangfire.AutofacBootstrapperConfigurationExtensions.UseAutofacActivator(Hangfire.IBootstrapperConfiguration,Autofac.ILifetimeScope)
member.summary: Tells bootstrapper to use the specified Autofac lifetime scope as a global job activator.
member.param: Autofac lifetime scope that will be used to activate jobs

member.name: T:Hangfire.AutofacJobActivator
member.summary: HangFire Job Activator based on Autofac IoC Container.

member.name: M:Hangfire.AutofacJobActivator.#ctor(Autofac.ILifetimeScope)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the given Autofac Lifetime Scope.
member.param: Container that will be used to create instance of classes during job activation process.
